column4: I installed Fedora and during installation it said booter failed.   I clicked okay and it continued... then said installation was finished... then I went to restart the computer and then it went to load Windows, and then Windows crashed showing a blue screen and restarted saying it couldn't be loaded... Any suggestions?? anyone?? :O
I am not sure.  I created Ubuntu with 100 gb.  I realize that i only need about 30-40 GB.  Would like to send the 70-60 GB back to my windows 8
